definition: at a loss/unable to do anything about it/to have no choice
France/French/abbr. for 法國|法国[Fa3 guo2]/Taiwan pr. [Fa4]
law/method/way/to emulate/(Buddhism) dharma/(abbr. for 法家[Fa3 jia1]) the Legalists/(physics) farad (abbr. for 法拉[fa3 la1])

sentences.english: Laurier : I never forgot her cry.
She keeps after her boyfriend all day long and he can't bear it any more.
sentences.chinese: 她整天都在与她的男朋友争吵，他没法再忍受下去了。

sentences.english: I can't, I can't do this. I'm so excited that I can't eat lunch.
sentences.chinese: 我实在太兴奋了，以至于我都没法吃午餐了。

sentences.english: There’s no getting away from it, if you’re Irish.
sentences.chinese: 只要你做了爱尔兰人，你是没法摆脱它的。

sentences.english: He tried in vain to push through the crowd.
sentences.chinese: 他怎么也没法从人群里挤过去。
我没法儿相信自己的眼睛。

sentences.english: I'm frustrated that I can't concentrate on my homework.
sentences.chinese: 我没法把注意力集中在我的作业上，真令人泄气。

sentences.english: We can't move that hulking great desk on our own.
sentences.chinese: 靠我们自己没法搬动那张又大又笨重的办公桌。

sentences.english: But you don't get it from torture.
sentences.chinese: 但你没法从酷刑中得到它。

sentences.english: I never seem to be able to pay attention to our teacher.
sentences.chinese: 我似乎向来就没法去注意我们的老师。

sentences.english: This time Old Xu couldn't even get up to open his door.
sentences.chinese: 这次老许甚至没法起床开门了。

sentences.english: Yeah, driving in LA, it's really unpredictable and can be dangerous.
sentences.chinese: 是的，在洛杉矶开车，真的没法预测，可能很危险。

sentences.english: As he was in the hall I could not go into the front parlour and lie at the window.
sentences.chinese: 因为他在走廊里，所以我没法走到前厅靠着窗户躺下。

sentences.english: She could hardly blame the poor horse.
sentences.chinese: 她没法去责怪可怜的马儿。

sentences.english: “Without them, we couldn’t hold our own in the Bundesliga,” says Mr Rangnick.
sentences.chinese: “没有他们，我们的德甲就没法继续”兰尼克如是说。

sentences.english: Sadly, the mansion nowadays is found on no map.
sentences.chinese: 可惜的是，这座公馆现在没法在地图中找到。

definition: there is nothing to be done/one can't do anything about it
can only/obliged to do sth/to have no other choice
no thanks (used to politely but informally decline)
won't do/be out of the question/be no good/not work/not be capable
haven't/hasn't/doesn't exist/to not have/to not be
without any better option/to have to/to be forced to
